title: Lunch & Learn Series
description: Featured guest in CfPA's webinar series. Session billed "Lunch & Learn with Alon Hillel-Tuch (Co-founder of RocketHub)", sharing industry insights on crowdfunding trends and best practices for entrepreneurs and investors.

title: The Sound Entrepreneur
description:
"How does an investor make money with equity crowdfunding?"

Audio interview for business advice media outlet. Explained equity crowdfunding models and ROI expectations in roundtable-style discussion, helping demystify crowdfunding for creatives and startups.
